r.d:
This package provides basic support to localize your application, like locale based formatting of dates, numbers and currencies.
Beside that it attempts to provide an OS independent way to setlocale() and aims to provide language and country names translated into many languages.
NOTE: Contributions are very welcome!
r.n:
Bug Fixes: * strftime() codes for I18Nv2_Locale::date() and I18Nv2_Locale::time() were mixed up * set inconv's input encoding to the same as output encoding in I18Nv2::autoConv() * fixed typos in I18Nv2::languageOf() and I18Nv2::countryOf() referring non-existent class * prevent encoding the output buffer multiple times if I18Nv2::autoConv() is called more than once
New Features: + allow overriding of the currency symbol in I18Nv2_Locale::formatCurrency() (requested by Andreas Schamberger) + added a filtering decorator for lists, I18Nv2_DecoratedList_Filter
